title: Checklist Item
description: An individual task or step in the onboarding process.

id.description: Unique identifier for the checklist item.

description.description: Detailed description of the checklist item.

completed.description: Completion status of the item, determined dynamically or stored.

completionType.description: How the completion of this item is determined.

action.description: Action associated with the checklist item.

docsUrl.description: URL to documentation or video resources.

dependsOn.description: List of checklist item IDs that this item depends on.

metadata.description: Additional metadata for the checklist item.
